sentences.sentence: Conclusion: Earlier rehabilitation therapy obviously ameliorates motor function and increase quality of life in ACVA patients.
sentences.translation: 结论：早期康复能明显地改善急性脑卒中患者的运动功能，提高生命质量。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study whether pioglitazone therapy ameliorates endothelial dysfunction in pre-diabetic patients and the mechanism of it.
